title: THCBlas error building from source
body_html:
Hi, I was trying to update from source but I get an error "no suitable constructor exists to convert from "int" to "__half"" when trying to build pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu.

I am working with python 2.7 cuda 7.5 and GCC 4.8.3 in openSUSE. Any suggest?

Here is the output error when building from source:

ATen Excluded: set(['bernoulli', 'bernoulli_'])
[ 0%] Built target aten_files_are_generated
[ 0%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o
[ 1%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCStorage.cu.o
[ 1%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCSleep.cu.o
[ 1%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o
[ 1%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCStorageCopy.cu.o
[ 2%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCTensor.cu.o
[ 2%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorMath.cu.o
[ 2%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorCopy.cu.o
/home/gabriel/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu(77): error: no suitable constructor exists to convert from "int" to "__half"

/home/gabriel/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu(77): error: no suitable constructor exists to convert from "float" to "__half"

2 errors detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_0000587a_00000000-7_THCBlas.cpp1.ii".
CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
Error generating file
/home/gabriel/pytorch/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o

src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:70: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir//THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:194: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

I am working with python 2.7 cuda 7.5 and GCC 4.8.3 in openSUSE. Any suggest?

body:
Hi, I was trying to update from source but I get an error "no suitable constructor exists to convert from "int" to "__half"" when trying to build pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu.

I am working with python 2.7 cuda 7.5 and GCC 4.8.3 in openSUSE. Any suggest?

Here is the output error when building from source:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ATen Excluded: set(['bernoulli', 'bernoulli_'])
[  0%] Built target aten_files_are_generated
[  0%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.o
[  1%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCStorage.cu.o

[  2%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorCopy.cu.o
/home/gabriel/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu(77): error: no suitable constructor exists to convert from "int" to "__half"

/home/gabriel/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu(77): error: no suitable constructor exists to convert from "float" to "__half"

  Error generating file

src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:70: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCBlas.cu.o' failed
